title: bobyben
author: bobyben
content: Are you looking for a way to create your own tokens on the Ethereum, Polygon, or Binance Smart Chain networks? Do you want to save time and money by automating the token generation process with smart contracts? Do you want to own a profitable and scalable SaaS business that provides this service to other users?If you answered yes to any of these questions, then you might be interested in buying Coincode.app, a SaaS blockchain service that generates tokens on multiple networks. Coincode.app is a web application that allows users to create their own tokens on the Ethereum, Polygon, or Binance Smart Chain networks with just a few clicks. Users can customize the token name, symbol, decimals, supply, and other parameters. The tokens are generated by smart contracts that are deployed on the respective networks. Users can also access the token contract address, ABI, and source code.Coincode.app is a fully functional and tested product that has been launched in 2020. It has a user-friendly interface, a secure backend, and a robust infrastructure. It has a growing customer base and a positive feedback. It has a low operational cost and a high profit margin. It has a huge market potential and a competitive edge.Coincode.app is for sale because the owner is moving on to other projects. The owner is looking for a serious buyer who can take over the business and grow it further. The owner is willing to provide support and guidance during the transition period. The owner is also offering a referral fee for anyone who can find a suitable buyer.If you are interested in buying Coincode.app, please send a private message to the owner with your offer and contact details. This is a rare opportunity to own a SaaS blockchain service that generates tokens on multiple networks. Don't miss it!Sale is available on flippa with escrow.Website : https://coincode.app telegram : https://t.me/bitsupportix
